active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs of using private claims versus registered claims in a multi-tenant SaaS application. Consider interoperability, security risks (e.g., collisions), and real-world examples from OAuth2/OIDC implementations. Support arguments with RFC 7519 and RFC 8725 references.
